column5: Despite the heat and gusting winds, fishing was just fantastic.  My chauffeur dropped me off at the pond by 7 and my good friend, Bill/Smerchly, joined me at 8. We had us another one of those  50+ fish days for each of us. White and yellow perch, drum, cats, crappie, pike, and some OOS stuff. The only thing not biting were the carp and sunfish. This was my wake up call.   Didn't take too many pics. Too busy setting and resetting lines all day.     The first sighting of the season.   Despite the fact I look, and feel, like a cooked lobster now, it was an excellent day.
congrats on the good day , i got skunked fishing pike on couchiching
That is one butt ugly sheephead.  Looks like you had a great day.   Well done  Joey
Nice array of fish you guys got there. Big nasty scar on that sheephead. Way to go fellas
That right there, is an ugly "bottom sucker"!!!... and the fish aint that purdy either!!!   ... just razzin' ya a little Bruce!
show me a sheephead that isn't butt ugly! Nice job guys, looks like a great day
nice report, man i cant wait to get out!  Cheers!
Like I've always said Dawg. I'm big an ugli, but the fish don't seem to mind.
Great to see you guys were able to get out today Bruce and that the fish were biting.  I'm stii @ work LOL
Feelin a bit better today are we?
Nice day and lots of fish to boot, did you see any sunfish or just not there, I'd like to get 1 for Team 8 while there shallow, hopefully tomorrow Richard
good job guys seems like a good day of fishing
You know how many times I've driven by there and wondered "gee, what's in there?" Well it's been plenty and now I know, thanks Bruce.
Stop by and hook up some time.  Like the old timers used to say, 'fishing and friendship go hand in hand'.
sounds like a great day!  that is one ugly drum though.
gotta love when everythings biting, nice work!
I'll see what I can do Bruce. When passing by I'm usually on my way to and from fishing the big river.
There are pretty ones?  JF
Gotta love the days when everything is biting,  Looks like you took a bite out of that Sheepshead.   Just kidding Bruce , hope you aren't too badly sunburned after that great day out.
You know Bruce, even thought you're lobster crisp.... you still got a great day :  Congratulations Thanks for sharing Jacques
